# ui-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                                                       | Type                         | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | ----------- |
| `accessibleLabel` | `accessible-label` | Specifies the alternative text                                                    | `string`                     | `undefined` |
| `disabled`        | `disabled`         | Specifies if button is  disabled                                                  | `boolean`                    | `false`     |
| `type`            | `type`             | Specifies the type attribute for the native button ("button", "submit", "reset"). | `string`                     | `'button'`  |
| `variant`         | `variant`          | Specfifies the button variant                                                     | `"alternative" \| "primary"` | `'primary'` |
